Texts.Chs: 如果你饿了，你可以利用^orange;篝火^reset;烹饪一份鲜嫩多汁的肉。但首先你需要弓，狩猎矛，骨矛或狩猎步枪来猎杀动物才能获得肉。请^orange;获取^reset;肉然后^orange;烹饪^reset;它。
Texts.Eng: When you're starving, you have some options. A ^orange;campfire^reset; cooks your meat. It's fast, but you'll need a bow, hunting spear, bone spear or hunting rifle to obtain the meat. ^orange;Get some^reset; and cook it. Then noms.

Texts.Chs: 或者你也可以选择花点时间制作一把锄头并开始建立你的农场。农场会为你提供更为充足的食物，这会让你避免因饥饿而死亡。
Texts.Eng: You could also take time to craft yourself a ^orange;hoe^reset; and set to work making a viable farm. It will feed you far more in the long-term without risking death.
